abstract: A nit-picking puzzle from Kristian House.
snippet: A nit-picking puzzle from Kristian House.
lead_paragraph: TUESDAY'S PUZZLE - I know I've mentioned this before, but if you haven't seen the documentary Wordplay, for which this blog is named, you should definitely give it a whirl. It's a very interesting peek into the world of crossword construction and competitive solving. Some of the people whose bylines you see in The New York Times crossword make an appearance in the film.
